Basics Introduction The whole website is developed based on Hugo and PaperMod theme.
Deployment The website is deployed on GitHub Page.
Create a new repository with the name yourname.github.io
Initialize a git in public folder.
1 2 3 4 5 6 cd public git init git remote add origin [repository url] git add . git commit -m 'init' git push -f --set-upstream origin master hugo -F --cleanDestinationDir will generate the output file under public folder. Push changes in public folder to Github, and website will be automatically deployed.
Code font Content Fonts Here I use Josephin Sans. Copy the generated HTML and CSS, insert the HTML into themes/PaperMod/layouts/partials/extend_head.html, and insert CSS into themes/PaperMod/layouts/assets/css/extended/blank.css
Code Fonts I use Ubuntu Mono. Same steps as content fonts.
